source_text: The Project has a legacy 2% Net Smelter Royalty over the project from when Red Hawk Mining acquired it from Maximus Resources in 2009.
additional_details: This is a legacy royalty on the Canegrass Project. It originated when Red Hawk Mining (formerly Flinders Mines Ltd) acquired the project from Maximus Resources in 2009. Therefore, Maximus Resources likely receives the royalty, and the current project owner (Viking Mines Limited) would be responsible for paying it.
